businessModels.title: AI Automation Agency
businessModels.summary: Build custom AI workflows for local businesses. High margins, low overhead, growing demand.

details.caseStudy: Agency scaled to $15k/mo in 6 months serving 8 clients. Average client pays $1,800/mo for AI chatbots, email automation, and lead qualification systems.
details.cac: $200-400 per client via LinkedIn outreach and local networking
details.marketingPlan: LinkedIn content → Free AI audit → Paid pilot → Retainer. Focus on dental offices, law firms, real estate agents who need lead nurturing but lack tech skills.

businessModels.title: Micro-SaaS (Niche Tools)
businessModels.summary: Build small software tools solving specific problems. Recurring revenue, scalable, can be mostly automated.

details.caseStudy: Developer built a $4k/mo tool for podcast editors in 3 months. Simple transcription + show notes generator. 120 users at $39/mo.
details.marketingPlan: Build in public on Twitter → ProductHunt launch → SEO content → Niche community engagement. Target micro-niches with painful manual work.

businessModels.title: Content Arbitrage
businessModels.summary: Repurpose viral content across platforms. Low skill barrier, fast setup, moderate income potential.

details.caseStudy: Creator earning $3k/mo reposting Reddit stories to TikTok with AI voiceovers. 200k followers, 5M monthly views, monetized via TikTok Creator Fund + brand deals.
details.marketingPlan: Post 3x daily → Use trending sounds → Hook in first 3 seconds → Cross-post to YouTube Shorts/Instagram Reels. Scale with AI tools for voice + editing.

businessModels.title: Local Lead Generation
businessModels.summary: Rank local service websites, sell leads to contractors. Passive income once ranked, proven model.

details.caseStudy: Operator runs 12 lead gen sites earning $8k/mo. Each site ranks for 'roofing [city name]' and sells leads at $50-150 each to local roofers.
details.marketingPlan: Build simple site → Local SEO (GMB, citations, backlinks) → Rank in 4-8 months → Sell leads on pay-per-lead or monthly retainer basis.

businessModels.title: Digital Product Empire
businessModels.summary: Sell courses, templates, guides in a niche you know. High margins, no inventory, infinite scale.

details.caseStudy: Designer selling Notion templates makes $12k/mo. Portfolio of 15 templates at $19-79 each. Built audience of 40k on Twitter sharing free tips.
details.cac: $0-20 via organic content and email list
details.marketingPlan: Build audience with free value → Launch with waitlist → Upsell template bundle → Automate with Gumroad/Lemon Squeezy. Focus on specific outcome (e.g., 'Notion for freelancers').

businessModels.title: Affiliate SEO Sites
businessModels.summary: Review products, earn commissions. Passive once ranked, requires upfront content investment.

details.caseStudy: Site reviewing camping gear generates $5k/mo from Amazon Associates + brand partnerships. 150 articles, 50k monthly visitors, 8 months to profitability.
details.marketingPlan: Target long-tail buyer keywords → Publish comprehensive reviews → Build backlinks → Update seasonally. Focus on high-commission niches (software, tools, electronics).

businessModels.title: Done-For-You Service (Virtual)
businessModels.summary: Offer specialized service remotely. Quick to start, trades time for money initially, can scale with team.

details.caseStudy: Virtual bookkeeper serving e-commerce brands at $800/mo per client. Started solo, hired 2 VAs after 6 months, now manages 15 clients.
details.marketingPlan: Niche down hard (e.g., Shopify stores only) → Join relevant communities → Offer free audit → Close on value. Scale by systematizing and hiring.

businessModels.title: Newsletter Empire
businessModels.summary: Curate valuable content, monetize via sponsors and products. Slow build but high upside.

details.caseStudy: AI newsletter with 25k subscribers earning $6k/mo. 2 sponsor slots at $2k each, plus $2k from affiliate links and paid recommendations.
details.cac: $0.50-2 per subscriber via Twitter growth + referral program
details.marketingPlan: Weekly valuable curation → Guest posts on larger newsletters → Referral incentives → Monetize at 5k+ subs. Use Beehiiv or ConvertKit for growth tools.

businessModels.title: E-commerce (Dropshipping/POD)
businessModels.summary: Sell physical products without inventory. Competitive but accessible, moderate margins.

details.caseStudy: Print-on-demand store selling niche meme apparel: $8k/mo profit on $25k revenue. Uses Printful + Shopify, runs Meta ads to warm audiences.
details.marketingPlan: Find trending niche → Test designs with ads → Scale winners → Build retargeting funnels. Focus on passionate micro-communities (hobbies, professions, memes).

businessModels.title: YouTube Automation
businessModels.summary: Faceless YouTube channels with outsourced production. High upside, requires content quality focus.

details.caseStudy: Faceless finance channel earning $10k/mo from AdSense + sponsorships. 100k subs, outsources scripts ($50), voiceover ($30), editing ($100) per video. Posts 3x/week.
details.marketingPlan: Pick evergreen niche (finance, history, tech) → Hire VA team → Optimize thumbnails/titles → Publish consistently. Monetize via ads, sponsors, affiliate links in description.
